titles: The doctrine decimal arithmetick, simple interest, &c. as also of compound interest and annuities generally performed for any time of payment or rate of interest by help of a particular table of forbearance of 1l principal, with enlarged rules, formerly abridged for portability in a letter case / by John Collins ; and since his death, both made publick by J.D.
author: Collins, John, 1625-1683.
publisher: Printed by R. Holt for Nath. Ponder,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
